code: import moment from'moment';export function getMMMDDYYYY(date){var monthNames=['Jan','Feb','Mar','Apr','May','Jun','Jul','Aug','Sep','Oct','Nov','Dec'];var day=date.getDate();var monthIndex=date.getMonth();var year=date.getFullYear();return"".concat(day," ").concat(monthNames[monthIndex]," ").concat(year);}export function getWeekDays(weekStart){var days=[weekStart];for(var i=1;i<7;i+=1){days.push(moment(weekStart).add(i,'days').toDate());}return days;}export function getWeekRange(date){return{from:moment(date).startOf('week').toDate(),to:moment(date).endOf('week').toDate()};}export default null;
